QuestData.Title: The Path to Respect Lies in Violence
QuestData.Description: You have proven yourself in battle.$B$BStill, if you would aid us further, I must ask something else of you.$B$BThe Sha of Violence awaits beyond within the Sealed Chambers. Destroy it if you would earn my respect.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Master Snowdrift has asked you to slay this vile creature.
